nodes.text: Arthur (Arfy) Papadam wrote the backstory of Bal'demnic, and co-wrote the backstory of Leektar appearing in the Databank, through the What's The Story? feature of Hyperspace.

In 2018 Arfy wrote and directed a fan film / mockumentary called The Dackwaller Files, which he submitted in the 2018 Star Wars Fan Awards, Long Video category. It was selected as a finalist for the Audience Choice award.
He played for the 2014 national Australian quidditch team, and invented wheelchair quidditch in 2011.
Arthur is a graphic designer, and redesigned the website of Abel G. Peña in 2009.

Other fan projects include the creation of Star Wars Outsider magazine in 2007, being a former administrator at Wookieepedia (under alias Azizlight), and costume making (see Jedi costume pictured right).
His alias is Arf Maul on StarWars.com, and arf_maul on TheForce.net.
